original_text: “A man who is clean shall gather up the ashes of the heifer and put them in a ceremonially clean place outside the camp. They are to be kept by the Israelite community for use in the water of cleansing; it is for purification from sin.
korean_text: 이에 정결한 자가 암송아지의 재를 거두어 진영 밖 정한 곳에 둘지니 이것은 이스라엘 자손 회중을 위하여 간직하였다가 부정을 씻는 물을 위해 간직할지니 그것은 속죄제니라

sentences.original_text: shall gather up the ashes of the heifer
and put them in a ceremonially clean place
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 의식적으로 깨끗한 곳에 둘 것이다

sentences.original_text: They are to be kept by the Israelite community
for use in the water of cleansing
it is for purification from sin
